title: What is the cost of ISO 9001 registration? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a very difficult question to answer. Cause there are two components involved in the cost 1 consultation cost 2 certification cost Certification cost is constant which is around rs 15k. But the consultation cost varies depending upon the services provided by organizations you can contact a few companies and ask for their quotes and Based on the quotes and related services you can finalise.
